narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Fairview Hospital is a General Acute Care Hospital provider based in Cleveland, OH. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $62.4M in Medicaid payments across 1.5M claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $62.4M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
